Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 221st overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/3/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/4/2016 to a 5-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 6/25/2018 (Going to CIN: SS Clifford Brantner, RF Jc Salomon, P Ronald Diep. Going to STL: P Alfonso Rodriguez, CF Christopher Miller, P Bill Johnson)...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to San Francisco on 7/15/2018 (Going to STL: 2B Michael Holgate, LF Micheal Dore, RF Donald Lamberth, P Brian Eppinger. Going to SF: 2B Maurice Sydnor, P Barry Sechrist, P
Lino Gonzalez, P Alfonso Rodriguez)...
Was claimed off waivers by Montreal on 7/26/2019.
Released by Montreal on 3/2/2020...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 4/16/2020 to a minor league deal...
